bwwExcerpt: "There's a little too much talk of how paintings 'pulse' - though Donald Holder's lighting simulates the effect magically - and a few of the assistant's background details seem unnecessarily maudlin. No doubt these were inserted to give his character depth, so he'd be more than just Rothko's sounding board.
